headlines.description: Sadio Mane scored twice and Mohamed Salah also got in on the act as Liverpool recovered from conceding the first goal to beat Newcastle 3-1.

video.headline: How Roberto Firmino impacts Liverpool's attack

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC EPL PD41(How Roberto Firmino impacts Liverpool's attack) 2019/09/14 GLOBAL

headlines.shortLinkText: Mane stars as Liverpool come from behind to win

headlines.description: Substitute Jeff Hendrick grabbed a 90th minute equaliser as Burnley held Brighton and Hove Albion to a 1-1 draw at the Amex Stadium.
headlines.shortLinkText: Hendrick late leveller gives Burnley point at Brighton

headlines.description: Manchester United won for the first time since the opening weekend of the season following a 1-0 victory against Leicester.
headlines.shortLinkText: Rashford penalty sees United past Leicester

headlines.description: Southampton beat Sheffield United 1-0 at Bramall Lane to pick up their second Premier League win through a Moussa Djenepo strike.
headlines.shortLinkText: Djenepo solo effort sees Southampton beat Sheffield Utd

headlines.description: Tottenham's Son Heung-min scored twice as they put their early season struggles behind them with a 4-0 win over Crystal Palace.
headlines.shortLinkText: Son shines as Tottenham hit four past Palace

headlines.description: Tammy Abraham scored a hat trick as Chelsea secured an impressive 5-2 victory against Wolves at Molineux on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Abraham scores 3, own goal in Chelsea win

headlines.description: Manchester City fell five points behind Liverpool at the top of the table after a shocking 3-2 defeat at Norwich.
headlines.shortLinkText: City shocked by Norwich, Liverpool five clear
